name: Turmoil, structure
description:
A series on Order, turbulence and chaos.
A regular grid is distorted by layers or composited noises, suggesting the motion of forces: wind, waves, erosion, fractured stones. After reaching peak turbulence, the composition returns to a calm state.
This wireframe version of a larger series focuses on structure, rather than materials, shading and textures. 
Released as an Airdrop during Art Basel Miami 2021 on my collector's Discord:
discord.gg/ZTK8c4tgW7
